duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcoming and guiding each Client across values and heritage, getting to know the Client, and advising honestly and genuinely.
Collecting Client's valuable information throughout the journey.
Proactively engaging in 1-to-1 activities to nurture relationships with Clients.
Having strong knowledge of the collection and providing insights on fabrics and product specificities.
Driving Sales, achieving individual results, and contributing to the team ones.
Supporting BOH organization and procedures implementation as well as replenishment/transfer activities.
Supporting the maintenance of the store’s visual merchandising standards.
May have opening and closing responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: At least some experience in sales roles in Fashion Retail/Hospitality; or interest/study in Fashion related courses - Experience in Luxury and Contemporary Retail environment is a plus
